name: Talking Super Car - New Planet
description:
Introduction
"Hello, talk to me~", lively car who can run, jump and talk looking for its friend. Drive your car and enjoy a mystical sight here, if earth is boring to you, try challenging your imagination here.

Game characteristic
1. Run, Jump &Talk.
2. Mystical world.
3. Customize your car.
4. Buff up, be rich!

Rules
1. Drive your car, huge treasure on the way.
2. Collect more cars and customize them.
3. Unlock more planets, challenge your imagination.
4. Level up your cars and planets, it will be helpful for treasure collection.
5. Make a good use of multi-touch and buffs.
6. Talk to your car, it will be more "powerful".

How to play
1. Tap the accelerator to drive the car.
2. Make sure that your car have enough gas.
3. Use the buff and store items appropriately.
4. Level up your car to collect faster.
5. Level up your planet to collect more.
6. Level up buff skills to enjoy a treasure growth spurt.
7. Don't stop exploring; more cars and mystical world are in front of you.
